block.p: LEAD: Ray Tolbert, the veteran forward who was waived by the Knicks earlier this month, has signed with the Los Angeles Lakers, the team said today. No terms were disclosed. Tolbert, a 6-foot-9-inch, 240-pounder averaged 4.3 points and 3.2 rebounds in 11 games with the Knicks before they waived him Dec.

LEAD: Ray Tolbert, the veteran forward who was waived by the Knicks earlier this month, has signed with the Los Angeles Lakers, the team said today. No terms were disclosed. Tolbert, a 6-foot-9-inch, 240-pounder averaged 4.3 points and 3.2 rebounds in 11 games with the Knicks before they waived him Dec.

Ray Tolbert, the veteran forward who was waived by the Knicks earlier this month, has signed with the Los Angeles Lakers, the team said today. No terms were disclosed. Tolbert, a 6-foot-9-inch, 240-pounder averaged 4.3 points and 3.2 rebounds in 11 games with the Knicks before they waived him Dec. 6. Tolbert, 29 years old, replaces the injured Jeff Lamp on the Lakers' roster.
